changeSet.sql: update tbl_merit_component set STATUS_CATALOG_ID = (select id from tbl_catalog where c_code= 'Active-Merit') where STATUS_CATALOG_ID is null;

changeSet.author: semami
changeSet.sql: DECLARE l_catalog_type_id NUMBER; BEGIN BEGIN SELECT id INTO l_catalog_type_id FROM tbl_catalog_type WHERE c_code = 'EvaluationStatus'; END; BEGIN INSERT INTO tbl_catalog (id, c_created_by, d_created_date, c_last_modified_by, d_last_modified_date, n_version, f_catalog_type_id, c_title, c_code, c_description) VALUES (seq_catalog_id.NEXTVAL, 'semami', current_timestamp, NULL, NULL, 0, l_catalog_type_id, 'اعتبار سنجی شده', 'Validated', ''); END; BEGIN INSERT INTO tbl_catalog (id, c_created_by, d_created_date, c_last_modified_by, d_last_modified_date, n_version, f_catalog_type_id, c_title, c_code, c_description) VALUES (seq_catalog_id.NEXTVAL, 'semami', current_timestamp, NULL, NULL, 0, l_catalog_type_id, 'خاتمه', 'Termination', ''); END; END;
